dialog: Behold, the final four charges written upon the page.
I regret to inform you, but a thorough investigation is required for these charges.
How long shall the investigation be, may I ask?
I'm uncertain, but I can assure you, the payment on these charges will be frozen in the meantime.
That is certainly splendid news.
Greetings, may I assist you in some manner?
That is what I am unsure of. Can I purchase Treasury Scrolls at this counter, perchance?
Indeed, we offer Treasury Parchments with terms of two, three and five years at your disposal.
Two years will suffice, with a worth of 1000 RIB.
Very well, could you present me with identification such as your wizarding passport?
Here you are. May I inquire, can these parchments be redeemed before the term's end?
I am afraid that is not possible. The parchments must reach maturity before they can be cashed in.
Listen here! Why have you taken that gold? You are a scoundrel and a cheat! I should send you straight to Azkaban!
I assure you, I am not cheating. When you reach 'Go' you collect 200 galleons, everyone knows the rules!
You cannot simply take the gold. You must seek approval from Gringotts Bank and I, as the Banker, am in charge.
Banker?
Yes, that is correct.
May I please have my 200 galleons?
Of course. Here you are, 200 galleons. Thank you for your patronage, please visit us again! Now, it is my turn to cast the dice.
Salutations, is this the office of Professor Clark?
